item.title: MoneyGram blames ‘cybersecurity issue’ for ongoing days-long outage
item.dc:creator: Carly Page
item.description:
The world's second largest money transfer provider said it doesn't have a timeline for when its services will return following a cyberattack.

item.title: Vista Equity Partners and Blackstone offer to buy Smartsheet for $8.4B in cash
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
Vista Equity Partners and Blackstone have agreed to acquire Smartsheet, the software-as-a-service (SaaS) workplace collaboration platform, for $8.4 billion in cash. The private equity firms say that the deal values publicly-traded Smartsheet’s shares at a 41% premium over its 90-day average closing share price. Should regulators and shareholders approve it, shareholders would receive approximately $56.50 […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Insta360’s excellent Link webcam gets a pair of successors
item.dc:creator: Brian Heater
item.description:
Insta360 is announcing two additions to its Link webcam line: the Link 2 and Link 2C.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Fintech Mesa promises 1% cash back on mortgages, up to 3x on other home needs
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description:
Mortgage fintech Mesa has emerged from stealth on Tuesday with $9.2 million in seed capital and a novel idea for homeowners. It’s offering cash back and rewards on all spending done on the home, including the mortgage itself.  Mesa is offering mortgage loans, original or refinancing, that include a credit-card-style 1% cash back on the […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Torq, which automates cybersecurity workflows, raises $70M in new capital
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
As the volume of cyberattacks grows, there’s increasing interest from the corporate sector in tech to help automate responses to breaches. Per a 2023 survey from analytics firm Devo, 80% of security leaders expected expanded investments in security automation technology this year; most cited the tech’s potential to support cyber threat mitigation. Projections say that the market […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: ByteDance is shutting down TikTok Music globally
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
Subscribers can continue to use the service until November 28, after which renewals will be automatically canceled.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Pinterest launches a feature to let users remix collages created by others
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
Pinterest created an engaging format with collages last year, which allows users to combine images and cutouts to create new content. The company is now banking on people creating more of them by introducing a Remix feature. Just like the Remix feature on short video apps, such as Instagram and Snap, the idea behind Pinterest’s feature is […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: WP Engine sends cease-and-desist letter to Automattic over Mullenweg’s comments
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
Mullenweg, who co-created WordPress, last week criticized WP Engine for raking in profits without giving much back to the open source project.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: GitHub will allow enterprise cloud customers to store data in the EU
item.dc:creator: Paul Sawers
item.description:
Starting from October 29, GitHub says that all enterprise cloud customers will be able to select an EU region to store all their code.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Fintech Jupiter in talks to buy a stake in SBM Bank India
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
In the latest instance of an Indian fintech startup pursuing strategic partnerships with traditional banking institutions, neobank Jupiter is in talks to acquire a stake in SBM Bank India, three sources familiar with the matter told TechCrunch. Jupiter, backed by Tiger Global and NuBank, is in discussions to buy a 5% to 9.9% stake in […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Crypto scammers hack OpenAI’s press account on X
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
OpenAI’s official press account on X appears to have been compromised by the same cryptocurrency scammers who compromised the accounts of company leadership in previous months. Late Monday afternoon, OpenAI Newsroom, an account OpenAI recently created to spotlight product- and policy-related announcements, posted about a supposedly new OpenAI-branded blockchain token, “$OPENAI.” “We’re very happy to […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Venture capitalists continue to play musical chairs
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
item.description:
From Keith Rabois to Ethan Kurzweil, a lot of VCs have switched firms or spun out of storied VC institutions to launch their own funds this year. These employment changes are surprising because unlike in many other fields, venture capitalists don’t traditionally move around very much — especially those who reach the partner or general […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: TechCrunch Space: SpaceX calls out ‘systematic challenges’ with FAA
item.dc:creator: Aria Alamalhodaei
item.description:
Hello and welcome back to TechCrunch Space. I wanted to flag once again that the final agenda for the Space Stage at TechCrunch Disrupt is now live. I’ll be pushing this event for the next few weeks, given that we’re just a bit over a month away! We’d love for you to join us. Want […]

item.title: Here is what’s illegal under California’s 9 (and counting) new AI laws
item.dc:creator: Maxwell Zeff
item.description:
California Governor Gavin Newsom is currently considering 38 AI-related bills, including the highly contentious SB 1047, which the state’s legislature sent to his desk for final approval. These bills try to address the most pressing issues in artificial intelligence: everything from futuristic AI systems creating existential risk, deepfake nudes from AI image generators, to Hollywood […]

item.title: Sam Altman catapults past founder mode into ‘god mode’ with latest AI post
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description:
Founder mode? Pffft. Who needs that when you can be the father of creation, ushering in a new age of humanity? Welcome to “god mode.” Sam Altman, the CEO of the AI startup headed for a $150 billion valuation, OpenAI, has historically pitched AI as the solution to the world’s problems, despite its significant impact […]

item.title: How Big Tech embraced nuclear power
item.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
item.description:
Companies are eyeing nuclear power as a way to reconcile their breakneck data center growth with their commitments to hit net zero carbon emissions.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: X will soon make your public posts visible to accounts you’ve blocked
item.dc:creator: Maxwell Zeff
item.description:
X will soon change the functionality behind its block button so that if you block an account, they will still be able to see your public posts, according to changes to X’s website spotted by independent app researcher Nima Owji. Elon Musk confirmed these changes on Monday, noting that blocked accounts will still not be […]

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Some Kaspersky customers receive surprise forced-update to new antivirus software
item.dc:creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
item.description:
After U.S. ban, Kaspersky's American customers were automatically migrated to UltraAV antivirus, in some cases without the customers' knowledge.

© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Tesla Superchargers: GM, Ford, Rivian, and other EV brands with access
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description:
EV owners of GM vehicles like the Chevrolet Silverado EV and Cadillac Lyriq will now officially have access to Tesla’s Superchargers.

item.title: Rivian reveals first $10M in grants for long-promised Rivian Foundation
item.dc:creator: Sean O'Kane
item.description:
Rivian has revealed the first $10 million worth of grants from the Rivian Foundation, three years after the EV maker vowed the philanthropy would receive 1% of its equity to make the “natural world” a “stakeholder in our success.” The company launched Monday a website for the foundation that details 41 grantees who will collectively […]
